Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to businesses impacted or dislocated by state and local infrastructure projects
Summary: Relates to businesses impacted or dislocated by state and local infrastructure projects; authorizes loans to certain businesses impacted or dislocated by state and local infrastructure projects.
LawSection: New York State Urban Development Corporation Act
LawCode: Amd ยง16-m, UDC Act; amd ยง213, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the urban development corporation act and the state finance law, in relation to businesses impacted or dislocated by state and local infrastructure projects
